LanguageData.EggPenguinFertilized.label: penguin egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggPenguinFertilized.description: Fertilized penguin egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby penguin. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggWormFertilized.label: worm egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggWormFertilized.description: Fertilized worm egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby worm. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggToratonFertilized.label: toraton egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggToratonFertilized.description: Fertilized toraton egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby toraton. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
